revision.text:
The '''FTranslatedLineTarget''' [[Structs|stuct]] can be used by functions like [[LineAttack (ZScript)|'''LineAttack''']] and '''[[AimLineAttack]]''' to output data related to a [[hitscan]] attack performed by those functions.
== Variables == *{{c|Actor '''linetarget'''}} :The actor that was hit by the attack if any. Otherwise {{c|null}}. *{{c|double '''angleFromSource'''}} :The angle towards the victim from the caller of the attack. *{{c|double '''attackAngleFromSource'''}} :The angle towards the victim from the position where it was hit by the attack. *{{c|bool '''unlinked'''}} :If true, the trace went through an unlinked portal.
== Methods == === Non-static === *{{c|native void '''[[TraceBleed]]'''(int ''damage'', Actor ''missile'')}} :Draws blood [[Decal|decals]] from the calling actor.
== See also == *[[LineAttack (ZScript)|LineAttack]] *[[AimLineAttack]]
